inventoryCount.description: The number of gifts currently available. This property allows the gift's availability to differ from its item or merchandise.

unitPoints.description: The points required to purchase a single unit of this gift.

item.description: The item associated with this gift. Note, it is required that a gift is associated with an item or a piece of merchandise, but never both.

merchandise.description: The merchandise associated with this gift. Note, it is required that a gift is associated with an item or a piece of merchandise, but never both.
